entry.title: Payment and Refund Stuck
entry.summary: In an email exchange dated March 16, 2016, Anthony Towns sought the opinions of his colleagues regarding a written document. Joseph Poon responded positively to the document, stating that it will be helpful in the future. He also pointed out some differences between their current code and the specifications in the document. However, he acknowledged that aligning the designs would be beneficial going forward. In conclusion, Joseph thanked Anthony for sharing the document.
